title: So someone rejoined a post game lobby 2 hours after they left..
body:
My friend sent me this screenshot a few hours after we ended this game
can anyone explain how this is possible?

replies.body:
AH, this has happened before to me once or twice. My internet had dc'd so I left League up and went on the Xbox and returned later to find out I had reconnected and disconnected twice into the same post-game chat room.

But then when I moved the mouse to click on the play again button(cause I think the internet was working fine) LoL client sent a message saying I had disconnected from the League client and had to reconnect.
was your friend waiting for someone to return?
Nope, he and I just have a habit of leaving the post game lobby and sending messages. We weren't waiting for them nor had any idea how they rejoined.
